description:
How can you add a database to your Jamstack app? In this episode, Tanmai Gopal will teach us how Hasura gets us up and running quickly with a powerful data layer in no time!

- demo: https://jamstack-databases-hasura.netlify.app/
- repo: https://github.com/learnwithjason/jamstack-databases-hasura

Links:
- https://hasura.io/
- https://hasura.io/learn/
- https://cloud.hasura.io/
- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZo1ciR8pZvdD3Wxp9aSNhQ
- https://twitter.com/hasurahq

Watch future episodes live at https://www.twitch.tv/jlengstorf
